member.name: T:Haply.HardwareAPI.Runtime.Generated.ToolStateMessage
member.summary:
Payload struct with fields corresponding to the contents of a TOOL_STATE message.
Note that data length specifiers are omitted. Fields corresponding to variable length data will be initialized with correctly-sized arrays at each read. Use the property to check the number of bytes received in each message.
To implement buffered read/write operations, please use the variant.

member.name: T:Haply.HardwareAPI.Runtime.Generated.BufferedToolStateMessage
member.summary:
Buffered payload struct with fields corresponding to the contents of a TOOL_STATE message.
Note that variable data fields and their data length specifiers are replaced by respective buffer, offset, and length fields, allowing for non-allocating read/write operations.
To implement direct read/write operations, please use the un-buffered variant.

member.summary: implementation for .
